--0-80757643-1076713299=:97730
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice chuckled, a chuck that he got from his brother.  It was low, and sounded evil.  Much like the greatest Leader of the Decepticons.  He served up a large glass for himself, he had nothing to fear.  He designed the waveform to affect a tolerance of standard Maximal thermal regulators.  His entire body was custom componants, plus he was turned into Transmetal 2.  He guzzled the cocktail and slammed the glass down.  He processed the alcohol and absorded the energon directly into his power system.  
"Satisfaction enough?"
He let a low evil chuckle slip out, he wasn't going to lose this drinking contest, at any cost.
 
OOC- A few refrences to Malice's family.  Lets see if anyone can guess who Malice's older brother is.  I'll bet its a suprise for you all.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She could tell that Malice was up to something. Her instincts told 
her to be careful.  She took the drink and sniffed it. "Hmm, seems to 
be delicious. However, it's hardly fair for me to have two drinks 
when you've only had one. Fix one of these for yourself and we'll 
keep going with this little game.  No fair that the bartender has an 
unfair advantage." She grinned at him with her usual charming wolfish 
grin. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice was a little hurt.  One of his most potent drinks flopped.  
As far as he knew, no Maximal or Predacon could handle the energy 
waveform.  It was just not feasible.  Perhaps systems could be 
adjusted to tolerate just a little more, but this was ridicules.  He 
could out drink any Seeker, Wrecker, Gestalt, Triplechanger, and even 
Supreme Commander.  This wasn't right.
> Then it hit him.
> <She might be hiding the problems that stuff is causing her.  That 
explains the optic color.  If so, then I'll catch her in the act.  
Hmp, she should be an actress on Broadway or something.>
> As he dove into a series of spare part compartments and drew from 
the liquors, he began to create a second energy format.  As he mixed 
a new drink in a new glass, he secretly added extra energy and 
manipulated it into this secondary waveform.  It did not affect the 
color, taste, smell, or texture, but it would cause a specific 
problem.  This attempt, was aimed at her thermal regulator.  In her 
current state, she would seek more than liquid refreshment.  Sure it 
was a cruel joke, but at least it wasn't going to harm her.  She 
could just run a diagnostic cycle on her systems and the problem 
would cease to be.  With a big smirk, he served his worthy opponant 
the new cocktail.
> "See if this razes your regulators."
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She took the glass and sniffed it. "Hmm, smells delightful."  She 
> downed it and grinned. Her optics flashed and glowed brightly for a 
> moment and then returned to normal. "Hmm, not bad at all."  She 
> smiled and remained sitting in a proper fashion.  What she wasn't 
> going to do was give him the satisfaction of knowing the that the 
> drink overpowered some of her systems enough so that she couldn't 
> stand up. As long as she remained sitting for a bit untill her 
> systems returned to normal, she could pull it off. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "I am Des Wraith, the Archfiend of Flames.  I have slaughtered 
thousands of demons who opposed me and will keep doing so.  And not 
even the great King of All Demons can stop my awesome wrath!"
> 
> ---------------------------------
